title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Introducing the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! This incredible playset is perfect for boys and girls aged 6 and up who love action-packed battles and collectible toys. 

The Bakugan Battle Arena features a customizable arena, allowing you to create the ultimate battleground for epic battles. It also includes a built-in phone holder, so you can easily keep track of your moves and strategies during gameplay. The arena comes with sparring totems, adding an extra level of excitement to your battles.

The centerpiece of this set is the Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid action figure. With its spinning feature and included ripcord, Dragonoid can unleash powerful attacks and take down opponents with ease. The multi-part ball linking system allows you to collect and customize your Bakugan figures, making each battle a unique experience.

The playset includes everything you need to get started, including 1 Deluxe Arena, 1 Special Attack Bakugan, 2 Clan Flags, 3 Sparring Totems, 1 Character Card, 1 Special Attack Card, 2 Gate Cards, 1 XL Rip Cord, and 1 Bakugan Token. You can also upgrade your playset with additional training sets, sold separately.

As an official Bakugan product, this playset is backed by the Spin Master Care Commitment, ensuring high-quality and durability. It also includes an online game code for the popular game, Roblox, allowing you to enhance your playtime even further.

With its collectible aspects, customizable features, and compatibility with other Bakugan products, the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid offers endless hours of fun and excitement. Don't miss out on this must-have toy for all Bakugan enthusiasts!

Introducing the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! This action-packed playset is perfect for kids aged 6 and up. 

The arena features customizable options, allowing kids to create their ultimate battleground. It also comes with a built-in phone holder, so they can easily record and share their epic battles. The arena includes sparring totem, adding an extra layer of excitement to the gameplay.

The set includes the exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, a powerful action figure that spins into action. It comes with a ripcord for launching it into battle. With its multi-part ball linking system, kids can collect and customize their Bakugan to create unique combinations.

The playset upgrades are compatible with training sets (sold separately), allowing kids to enhance their skills and take their battles to the next level. 

Inside the box, you'll find everything you need for epic battles, including 1 Deluxe Arena, 1 Special Attack Bakugan, 2 Clan Flags, 3 Sparring Totems, 1 Character Card, 1 Special Attack Card, 2 Gate Cards, 1 XL Rip Cord, and 1 Bakugan Token. 

As an official Bakugan product, it comes with the Spin Master Care Commitment, ensuring quality and durability. Plus, it includes an online game code for the popular game, Roblox.

Collectible aspects of this set include special attack variants and battle packs, allowing kids to expand their collection and create even more exciting battles.

Ideal for both boys and girls, this Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid is the ultimate toy for action figure enthusiasts. It's perfect for starter packs and is compatible with other action figures and collectibles. It even includes a special Roblox online game code for added fun!

Get ready for thrilling battles and epic adventures with the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid!
